Description:
Detects the exploitation of a security bypass and elevation of privilege vulnerability with Authentication Negotiation by using weak RC4-HMAC negotiation

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: KDC RC4-HMAC Downgrade CVE-2022-37966
Query: sourcetype='windows-system' eql select * from _source_ where eventid = '42' and provider_name = 'kerberos-key-distribution-center' and level = '2'
